summary: Bracers for appearance and enchantability only, no armor value.
descriptionHtml:
Nothing complex. Craftable Hide Bracers for cosmetic or enchantment purposes that will not impact your Mage Armor perk.

Recipe takes (1) Leather; (2) Leather Strips; (1) Linen Wrap

Extract the .esp to Skyrim/Data, make sure you have it enabled in the launcher, enjoy!


Thanks to Sunnie on the Nexus modding forums for pointing me in the right direction.
author: 13rimstone
